runs.comm: on target first up, pitched  on a length on middle stump. Kusal defends onto the leg side.
but that's one's a bit wayward. Kusal doesn't miss out. It's full and wide, Kusal frees his arms and slams that over mid off. First Jayasuriya comparisons of the day from Nasser Hussain

lovely timing. Just leant into it. Another full one from Steyn, closer into the stumps. Kusal opens the face and pushes it square on the off side, and though it's just a jab, it races to the deep point fence for four
wide down leg side
oh boy, best shot yet. That's that pick up shot from wide of off stump. He's loving this length from Steyn. It's slammed over cow corner.
wide down the off side this time. Steyn's radar is off
wide and full again, but Kusal's timing is not quite there this time. He gets it as far as mid off and they scamper one.

and carnage at the other end! What a first over. Steyn bowls a lovely ball, quick, fullish and pitching on off stump. Dilshan plays that horrible across-the-line swipe that has brought umpteen similar dismissal in the last two years. Looks like Steyn beat him for pace and the off stump is out of the ground.
begins with a leg side wide,
fullish ball on the pads, Perera doesn't make contact with an attempted flick to leg
length on the pads again, Perera clips it to leg this time, but it's straight to the square leg fielder
back of a length on the body, Perera turns it square on the leg side again and the batsmen take a quick single
length outside off stump, Mahela opens the face and gets it behind point for a single
length outside off stump, Kusal noticeably less ambitious in this over and he just knocks it back to the bowler
slower one I think, length on off stump again. Kusal just gently whips this into a gap at around midwicket. Another single.
short of a length at the body, worked off the hips behind square
length outside off stump, Mahela bunts this into the turf
backs away and hits a back of a length ball between cover and point. Not much power, but placed well enough for a single
another pick-up-shot, off the legs this time. Goes very high, and the fielder at deep midwicket thought he was in with a chance, but it's well over his head and all the way.
length outside off, Perera pushes this to mid off and runs
length ball on the legs, Mahela tries to work this fine, but it flicks his pad and passes through to the keeper
fullish on off stump, punched to long off
flick shot by Mahela this time. The ball was on his legs, he hits it somewhat aerially through square leg and it's cleaned up at the boundary
full on off stump, Mahela closes the face, but without much power.
length ball wide of off stump, late cut behind square for a single
another of those lovely pick up shots. He's got them humming today. That's full on about off stump, turns his wrist on it but it doesn't get as much elevation this time. One bounce four.
length on off stump, defended to the off side
comes down the track and threads the offside field. Typical Mahela stroke. He advanced, gave himself room, turns a length ball into a fullish one and flays this through cover

gone! Morkel's extra bounce might have done for the batsman. He tried to lift this back over the bowler's head but it hit too high on the bat, and manages only to get it as far as Steyn at mid on, who barely has to move to complete the catch. Big strike for SA.
length angled across Sangakkara first up. Driven to cover
length ball, tighter into the stumps this time. Hit to cover again.
length ball on off stump, defended to the leg side, but the field is far enough back to take a single
back of a length at the body. Kusal shuffles back and defends.
short ball outside off stump. Sanga gets on his toes and defends
short ball again, right at the head. Sanga goes for a very unconvincing hook and doesn't connect. Muted appeal for caught behind, but he hasn't hit that
back of a length at the body, Sanga works that to midwicket for a single
length outside off stump, check-driven to cover
smashed. No flicking there, just emphatic big-hitting. Length outside off stump, Kusal steps across and slogs across the line, it flies way over the cow corner fence
length on middle stump, slower ball I think. Just gently knocked into the legside infield where there is space for a single
fires one in on the toes first up, turned towards deep midwicket for a single
slower through the air, straightening on midde stump. Worked towards midwicket again
drops it a little shorter on the offside. Kusal pulls hard, but there's cover in the deep at cow corner
full, straightening outside off stump, Sangakkara pushes this towards cover
flatter, on the stumps, Flicks this towards mid wicket again, Kusal wanted a second, but he's sent back
full outside off stump, punched to long off. Six off the over, all singles.
Sanga hits a beautiful off drive to Morkel's first ball, which is overpitched outside the off stump. Lovely timing.
full on the stumps, Sanga tries to whip it square, but it takes a leading edge and squirts out behind square on the off side
full on the stumps again, punched to long on
length on the leg side, poor ball. Kusal just glances it past the keeper, and as fine leg is in the circle, there's only one result for that stroke
length on off stump, punched to cover
another one down the leg side, but Kusal lets it go this time
shortish ball on the body, short-arm pulled to the man at deep square leg. A little aerial, but very safe
short on leg stump, and Kusal shovels this very nicely behind square on the leg side, off the back foot.
on the legs again, no bat this time, but it hits thigh pad and evades the keeper

length ball, straightening outside off. Defended to cover. Kussal wanted a single, but he's sent back by Sanga. A direct hit from the cover fielder might have had him in trouble. Might have winded himself, diving to get back.
slows it down, but sends it down the leg side
Sanga is down the track, turning it into a full toss. Whips it to long on
fullish on the pads, turned behind square on the leg side. That's Kusal's fifty, off 29 balls. Fine innings. His team would love him to keep going.
fullish outside off stump, driven, but straight to cover.
floated up on middle stump. Kusal gets a stride in and whips it wide of deep midwicket
straighter one, slides past the outside edge of Sangakkara, who's playing an off drive
flattish outside off stump again, Sanga connects with the off drive this time
flatter again, on middle stump. Kusal sweeps to the legside sweeper

poor shot, and Tahir is ecstatic as usual. Sanga gets on one knee and tries to hammer a full, wide delivery to the straight boundary, but the ball is too wide to control and there might have been some topspin as well. Takes his top edge and loops gently to Lopsy at short third man
slower one, straightening on middle stump. Turned towards midwicket to get off the mark.
lovely shape first ball, as Mathews jumps out of the crease and tries to slam him over long on. A little outswing off a fullish length takes the ball away from the bat
lovely movement again, and Mathews can't get bat to ball. He tried to punch that away on the offside, but it beats the edge
another super ball. Short of a length, moving in the air and off the seem. Mathews pokes and is not even close to hitting that
short and at the body this time. Mathews ducks. Steyn follows up with a stare. He's fired up.
fuller, moving away again, but Mathews gets something on it. Hits the outside half of the bat and scoots to third man

bouncer, and that looked like it took the top edge, but it's safe. Kusal tries to hook a well-directed bouncer. It catches some part of the bat and lobs back towards the non-strikers' end, but Steyn is too far down the pitch to attempt a catch
full, straightening on middle. Mathews punches to long off
Kusal comes down the track and slams that back at the bowler, who can't hold on to it. Long on cleans up
floated up on off stump, Mathews hits to long on
Kusal still trying to smash everything. Skidder from Tahir, outside the off stump. Kusal tries to cut violently, but doesn't time it
full on the stumps, Kusal tries to hit that over long on but doesn't time it again. It's in the air, prompting shouts of catch-it, but it lands well short of the incoming  fielder
Mathews is down the track this time, turning a length ball into an overpitched one. Bludgeons this right back past the bowler, to the straight fence
full and wide, Kusal tries to bash that through the offside. Another top edge, but it lands well short of fine leg, running around
floated up on off stump, Mathews works that gently into the gap between deep midwicket and long on, giving himself enough time for two
down the track to a shortish ball, Mathews makes room and clubs it to the offside sweeper
full and on off stump, and Kusal has so much power in that bottom hand, it's obscene. He bludgeons that past a diving cover fielder, and the men on the fence had no chance
short and wide-ish, but he didn't try to over hit that cut shot, and point got a hand to it.

ungainly shot from Mathews, but it gets two runs. It's a bouncer at the body, Mathews backs away and swats at it like a tennis player with very bad service technique. It goes in the air between deep cover and long off. Easy double.
shortish on the stumps, Perera clubs that down the ground to long on
fired down leg side, Mathews turns it smartly down the leg side, but can't beat short fine leg

Tahir's done a brilliant job for his team here, and Kusal now gets himself out. He came at Tahir, who bowled another quick one down the off side. Possibly a googly. Kusal tries to bludgeon that over mid on, but gets a big top-edge, which AB de Villiers swallows at mid off
length on off stump, pushed into a gap on the off side
off the mark straight away with a cover drive off a fullish ball
full outside off stump, Mathews pushes to off and sets out for a run, but he's sent back
short of a length outside off stump, Chandi tries to cut but misses
full on off stump, driven to mid off, they scamper one
short of a length outside off stump again, Mathews swats at it but misses
Mathews backs away and Morkel follows him. A full toss on the thigh, which took the batsman by surprise. Manages to get it away towards long on, and some very good running gets them two
that's a nice shot. Maybe not exactly where he intended, but still got enough of it. This is full outside off stump, Mathews makes room and carves this over backward point for four
shortish ball on the stumps, Mathews clubs that straight of deep midwicket for one
full ball on off stump, Chandi opens his front hip and hits it past mid off, but Behaardien does a super job from long on, running around to cut that off
length outside off stump, Chandimal hits it straight to mid off and runs, but he would have been out had the throw hit. It doesn't, so the batsmen take an overthrow
over-the-shoulder scoop from Chandi gets him four. Takes it from wide of off stump and sends it just over Tsotsobe at short fine leg. Just inches from his finger tips.
length on the stumps, Chandimal heaves this away to deep midwicket
full ball, but way wide of off stump
wide of off stump, but this one isn't called a wide because Mathews had walked across his stumps.
wide yorker, Mathews squirts it out towards cover and they scamper one
Mathews is down the track again, doesn't quite get to the pitch, so he doesn't get all of it. But there's enough power in Mathews' shot to muscle it over the long on fielder and over the rope.
whacks a length ball in the air to long off
slogs this away on one knee, to deep midwicket
down the track again, Tahir almost does Mathews in by bowling it flat and wide but, Mathews reaches out and gets bat on it. Gets it past the bowler for a single

gone! Tahir's bowling too well to let batsmen run at him every ball. Chandimal comes at him, but Tahir has pulled back the length. The batsman misses with a slog across the line and de Kock has an easy stumping to complete, after collecting outside the leg stump.
fired flat and fast outside off stump,Thisara punches towards cover to get off the mark
and here goes Thisara. Steyn sends a length ball outside off stump, Thisara clears the front leg and wallops him wide of long on for four. A couple of bounces and over the fence
clears that front leg again, but Steyn goes wider and Thisara misses
yorker-length ball on the stumps, Thisara hits this towards midwicket for one
length outside off stump, Mathews tried to run it down to third man, but misses. Slower ball from Steyn.
short ball, and a lucky boundary for Mathews. He makes room and tries to hook Steyn. Gets a top edge which goes over the keeper and to the fence
shortish ball from Steyn, Mathews knocks it down into the leg side and there's enough space there for a run
Mathews backs away, but Morkel fires this wide down the offside and that's given as a wide
nice yorker on off stump, Mathews jams it out to mid off and scampers through
misses a yorker slightly, and Perera gets under that one, bashing over the bowlers' head. The SA fielders on the fence do a terrific job cutting that off though, and it's only two

a Twenty20 dismissal if I ever saw one. Perera aims a massive six over cow corner, swings at the length ball from Morkel, but he completely misses. The ball hits the top of off stump, as Perera's follow-through finishes up somewhere near square leg
length on off stump, hit cleanly back over Morkel. Duminy runs around from long on to tag it
Kule moves across to the off side, hoping to lap-scoop it past short-fine-leg, but Morkel follows him too well. In the end he bunts it to the legside infield and the batsmen cross
full toss on leg stump, Mathew squirts it to point and sprints through. Will be annoyed he didn't find the gap
full and on leg stump, Mathews jams down on that one, getting it towards long on, and they sprint two, much to Steyn's displeasure
full on the stumps, Mathews shovels that over the off side and deep cover has to run around to cut it off
full on the pads, Mathew tries to close the face on it after backing away, but he's a little fast on the shot. The ball hits the edge and deflects back onto the stumps.
full toss on the stumps, Senanayake drives that straight past the bowler, but without much power. Mid off cleans up.
slower length ball outside off stump, and Kule can't connect with an inside out shot. Super finish here from Steyn.
the bowler's unlucky there, but it happens. Wide yorker, Kule throws his bat at it, gets an outside edge and it slides past the keeper and is too fine for third man
